local_schema.short_desc: Ukumiselwa kwenkqubo yekhompyutha ezenzekelayo ye-URL kwikhompyutha esebenza njengemqobo
local_schema.longdesc: i-URL enika amaxabiso okumiselwa kwenkqubo yekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo.
Isiqhagamsheli esisematshinini esichazwa yi- "/systrem/proxy/socks_host" kwikhompyutha osebenza kuyo esebenza njengomqobo.

local_schema.short_desc: Igama lomququzeleli wekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo ye-SOCKS
local_schema.longdesc: Igama lomatshini kwikhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo ongasebenza kuyo.
Isiqhagamsheli ematshinini esichazwa yi -"/system/proxy/ftp_host" osebenza kuyo njengekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo.

local_schema.short_desc: Igama lomququzeleli wekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo ye-FTP
local_schema.longdesc: Igama lomatshini lokusebenza njengekhompyutha engumqobo kwi-FTP.

local_schema.short_desc: Isiqhagamsheli sekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo se-HTTP ekhuselekileyo
local_schema.longdesc: Isiqhagamsheli esisematshinini esichazwa yi- "/system/proxy/secure_host" kwikhompyutha osebenza kuyo esebenza njengomqobo.

local_schema.short_desc: Igama lomququzeleli wekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo ekhuselekileyo ye-HTTP
local_schema.longdesc: Igama lomatshini lokusebenza njengekhompyutha engumqobo kwi-HTTP ekhuselekileyo.
Khetha inkqubo emiselweyo yekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo. Amaxabiso axhaswayo ngala "none", "manual", "auto".

Eli qhosha liqulethe uluhlu lwabaququzeleli abaqhagamshelwe kuvimba weefayili, kunokuba badlule kwikhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo (ukuba iyasebenza). Amaxabiso anokuba ngamagama abaququzeleli, imimandla (usebenzisa i-wildcard njenge *.foo.com), idilesi ze-IP zabaququzeleli (zombini i-IPv4 ne-IPv6) kunye needilesi zothungelwano ene-netmask (into efana ne-192.168.0.0/24).
i-Password yokudlula njengoqinisekiso xa usebenzisa ikhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo kwi-HTTP.

local_schema.short_desc: Igama lomsebenzisi wekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo ye-HTTP
local_schema.longdesc: Igama lomsebenzisi ukudlula njengoqinisekiso xa usebenzisa ikhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo ye-HTTP.
Isiqhagamsheli ematshinini esichazwa nge- "/system/http_proxy/host" oqhagamshela kuso.

local_schema.short_desc: Igama lomququzeleli wekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo ye-HTTP
local_schema.longdesc: Igama lomatshini lokusebenza njengekhompyutha engumqobo kwi-HTTP.
Yenza ukuba imimiselo yekhompyutha esebenza njengomqobo xa usebenza nge-HTTP kwi-intanethi.

local_schema.short_desc: Uyibonisa njani inkonzo efikeleleka ngqo ye-DNS-SD
local_schema.longdesc: Amaxabiso anokubakhona ngala "merged", "separate" kunye "disabled".
Ukuba imiselwe kwinyani, iifayile zenkxaso ezinjengezo zidalwe yi-Emacs, ziyaboniswa. Okwangoku ziifayile kuphela eziphela njengophawu olufana nenyoka (~) ezicingelwa ukuba ziifayile zenkxaso.
Ukuba imiselwe kwinyani, iifayili ze-hidden ziyaboniswa kumphathi-zifayili. Iifayili ze-hidden zingaba ziifayile zechaphaza okanye zidweliswe kwifayile yesiqulathi-zifayili yefayili .hidden.
Nokuba ngaba kudlalwe izandi kwiinkqubo zomsebenzisi.
Vula isandi seseva kungeno.
Nokuba ngaba ukusebenzisa ifonti yecustom kwigtk+ iinkqubo.
Igama lefonti elungelelanisiweyo (ububanzi obuzinzisiweyo) kusetyenziso kwiindawo ezinjengeetheminali.
Igama leGTK+ indlela yegalelo leSimbo seSimo esisetyenziswe yigtk+.
Igama leGTK+ indlela yegalelo leSimbo sePreedit esisetyenziswa yigtk+.
Igama lefonti emiyo esetyenziswe yigtk+.
Igama elisisiseko somxholo omiyo osetyenziswa yi-gtk+.
Igama elisisiseko somxholo omiyo osetyenziswa yi-gtk+.
Umxholo womfanekiso ongumqondiso ekufuneka usetyenzisiwe kwindawo yolawulo, inautilus, njl-njl.
Nokuba ngaba oopopayi bangaboniswa. Qaphela: Eli liqhosha lehlabathi jikelele, litshintsha imo kamanejala wefestile, indawo yolawulo, njl-njl.
Umbala oseKunene okanye eZantsi xa uzoba ukuthambeka, awusetyenziswa kumbala ongqindilili.
Umbala osekhohlo okanye Phezulu xa uzoba ukuthambeka, okanye umbala ongqindilili.

Inani lemizuzu yexesha lokuchwetheza ngaphambi kokuqala kwemowudi yekhefu.

Ikhusela umsebenzisi ekushicileleni. Umzekelo, oku kuya kuvala ufikelelo kuzo zonke iinkqubo' "Shicilela" iibhokisi.

Inkqubo yekhompyutha omawuyisebenzise ukujonga iifayili ezifuna isixhobo ukuzijonga. Ixabiso lento ejikajikayo %s kuyakubakhona endaweni yalo iifayili ze-URIs, ixabiso lento ejikayo %c kuyakubakhona endaweni yaloisixhobo se-IID.
Isiphumezi-miyalelo esisetyenzisiweyo ekuqaliseni iinkqubo kwitheminali echazwe liqhosha 'exec'.

Igama lefonti yekhesa. Ukuba ayisetwanga, ifonti emiyo iyasetyenziswa. Olu ncedo luqhutywa ekuqaleni kwiseva X kwiseshini nganye, kengoko ukuyitshintsha phakathi akusayi kuba nasizathu de kube lixesha elilandelayo ungena.
Umda ngokwee-pixel isalathisi kufuneka sihambe ngaphambi kokusebenza kwentshukumo ekhawulezayo yemawusi. Ixabiso elingu-1 yinkqubo emiyo.
Isiphinda-phindi sokhawuleziso kwintshukumo yemawusi. Ixabiso elingu-1 yinkqubo emiyo.
uncedo olunokubakho "on", "off", and "custom".

local_schema.short_desc: Jikelezisa iindawo zolawulo ezisuka phezulu ziye ezantsi
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyaniso, upopayi wentlanzi uza kuboniswa aze ajikeleziswe kwindawo yolawulo esuka phezulu iye ezantsi.
Eli qhosha lixela inani lemizuzwana ekuya kuboniswa ngalo i-frame nganye.
Eli qhosha lixela inani lezakhelo zokukhetha eziya kuboniswa koopopayi bentlanzi.
Eli qhosha lixela ukuba umyalelo uya kuzanywa kwimpumezo xa icofiwe intlanzi.
Le ntlanzi ixela ukuba igama lefayili yesakhelo sokukhetha esiya kusetyenziselwa oopopayi ababoniswa kwinkqubo ye-applet yentlanzi enxulumene novimba weefayili wesakhelo sokukhetha.
Intlanzi engenagama yintlanzi entle edangeleyo. Yiphe ubomi intlanzi yakho ngokuyinika igama.

local_schema.short_desc: Shenxisela iifestile kwisithuba sokusebenza sangoku xa singacuthwanga
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyaniso, ngoko ke xa ifestile ingasacuthwa, yishenxisele kwisithuba sokusebenza sangoku. Ngaphandle koko, vula uye kwisithuba sokusebenza sefestile.
Yenza isigqibo sokuba iifestile zenkqubo enye yekhompyutha zibekwa nini ngokwamaqela kuludwe lweefestile. Amaxabiso anako ukufumaneka ngala "never", "auto" ngokunjalo "always".

local_schema.short_desc: Bonisa iifestile kuzo zonke izithuba zokusebenza
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyaniso, uludwe lwefestile luya kubonakalisa iifestile kuzo zonke izithuba zokusebenza. Ngaphandle koko luya kubonisa iifestile zesithuba sokusebenza sangoku.
Isantya oopopayi bendawo yolawulo esenzeka ngayo. Amaxabiso anokubakho ngala"slow", "medium" "fast". Eli qhosha liyimfuneko kuphela xa isitshixo se enable_animations siyinyaniso.
Ixela inani lee-pixel ezibonakalayo xa indawo yolawulo ifihleke ngokuzenzekelayo ekoneni. Eli qhosha liyimfuneko kuphela xa iqhosha auto_hide liyinyaniso.

local_schema.short_desc: Ukubambezeleka kwendawo yolawulo ngenxa yokufihleka okuzenzekelayo
local_schema.longdesc: Ixela inani lee-millisecond zokubambezeleka emva kokungena kwesalathi kummandla wendawo yolawulo phambi kokuba indawo yolawulo iphinde iboniswe ngokuzenzekela. Eli qhosha liyimfuneko kuphela xa iqhosha auto_hide liyinyaniso.

local_schema.short_desc: Ukubambezeleka kwendawo yolawulo ngenxa yokufihleka okuzenzekelayo
local_schema.longdesc: Ixela inani lee-millisecond zokubambezeleka emva kokushiya kwesalathi ummandla wendawo yolawulo phambi kokuba indawo yolawulo ifihleke. Eli qhosha liyimfuneko kuphela ukuba iqhosha auto_hide liyinyaniso.

local_schema.short_desc: Yenza ukuba izalathisi zisebenze kumaqhosha okufihla
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyaniso, izalathisi ziya kubekwa kumaqhosha okufihla. Eli qhosha liyimfuneko kuphela xa iqhosha enable_buttons liyinyaniso.
Ukuba yinyaniso, amaqhosha aya kubekwa kwicala ngalinye lendawo yolawulo enokusetyenziswa ukushenxisa indawo yolawulo kumngcipheko weskrini, kushiyeke iqhosha lodwa lisebenza.
Ukuba yinyaniso, ukufihleka nokungafihleki kwale ndawo yolawulo kuya kuba noopopayi kunokuba kwenzeke kwangoko.

Ukuba yinyaniso, indawo yolawulo ifihleka ngokuzenzekela ekoneni yeskrini xa isalathi siwushiya ummandla wendawo yolawulo. Ukushenxisa isalathi siye ekoneni kwakhona kuya kwenza ukuba indawo yolawulo ivele kwakhona.

local_schema.short_desc: Indawo esesizikithini enomgca ohamba embindini ongu y
Indawo Yolawulo esesizikithini esinomgca ohamba embindini ongu x

local_schema.longdesc: Indawo ekuyo indawo yolawulo emgceni ohamba embindini ongu y. Eli qhosha liyimfuneko kwimo yokusebenza engandiswanga. Kwimo eyandisiweyo yokusebenza eli qhosha alihoywa ukuze indawo yolawulo ibekwe emngciphekweni weskrini oxelwe liqhosha lembonakaliso.

Indawo ekuyo indawo yolawulo emgceni ohamba embindini ongu x. Eli qhosha liyimfuneko kuphela kwimo yokusebenza engandiswanga. Kwimo eyandisiweyo eli qhosha alihoywa ukuze indawo yolawulo ibekwe kumngcipheko weskrini oxelwe liqhosha lembonakaliso.

Ubude (ububanzi ukusuka phezulu iye ezantsi indawo yolawulo) bendawo yolawulo. Indawo yolawulo iya kuqikelela ngexesha lempumezo obona buncinci bobukhulu ngokusekwa kubukhulu obulungisiweyo nakwezinye iimo ezalathayo. Ubukhulu obubona bukhulu busisigxina kwikota enye yobude beskrini (okanye ububanzi).

Imbonakaliso le ndawo yolawulo. Amaxabiso anokubakho ngala "top", "bottom", "left", "right". Kwimo yokusebenza eyandisiweyo iqhosha lixela ukuba ngowuphi umngcipheko wendawo yolawulo okhoyo. Kwimo yokusebenza engandiswanga umahluko phakathi "top " kunye "bottom" awubalulekanga kakhulu - kwaye yomibini yalatha ukuba lendawo yolawulo isuka ekhohlo iye ekunene - kodwa ikwanika icebiso elinoncedo lokuba ingaba amanye amalungu endawo yolawulo kufuneka eziphethe njani. Umzekelo, "top" iqhosha lemenyu yendawo yokusebenza liya kuveza imenyu yayo ngezantsi kwendawo yolawulo, kanti kwindawo yolawulo "bottom" imenyu iya kuvezwa ngaphezu kwendawo yolawulo.

local_schema.short_desc: Iyanda ukuze ibonakale kubo bonke ububanzi beskrini
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyaniso, indawo yolawulo iya kubonakala kububanzi bonke beskrini (ngokobude ukuba le ndawo yolawulo isuka phezulu iye ezantsi). Ukuba le mo yokusebenza yendawo yolawulo inokubekwa kuphela kumngcipheko weskrini. Ukuba asiyonyaniso, indawo yolawulo iya kuba nkulu kuphela ngokwaneleyo ukwenzela ukufaka ii-applet, izindululi namaqhosha kwindawo yolawulo.

local_schema.short_desc: Iskrini se-Xinerama apho indawo yolawulo iboniswa khona
local_schema.longdesc: Kwisiseko seXinerama, usenokuba neendawo zolawulo kwiskrini ngasinye. Eli qhosha lichonga iskrini sangoku eboniswa kuyo indawo yolawulo.

local_schema.short_desc: Iskrini esingu X apho indawo yolawulo iboniswa khona
local_schema.longdesc: Ngesiseko sezkrini ezininzi, usenokuba neendawo zolawulo kwiskrini ngasinye. Eli qhosha lichonga iskrini eboniswa kuso indawo yolawulo ngoku.

local_schema.short_desc: Nika indawo yolawulo igama ukuze ichongeke
local_schema.longdesc: Eli ligama elifundekayo ebantwini onokulisebenzisa ukuchonga indawo yolawulo. Injongo yalo esentloko kukuba libe njengesihloko sefestile yendawo yokusebenza eluncedo xa kuntywilwa phakathi kweendawo zolawulo.

local_schema.short_desc: Jikelezisa umfanekiso kwiindawo zolawulo ezisuka phezulu ziye ezantsi
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyaniso, umfanekiso ongasemva uya kujikeleziswa xa indawo yolawulo ibonakaliswa ukusuka phezulu ukuya ezantsi.
Ukuba yinyaniso, umfanekiso uya kulinganiswa ngokwamacala endawo yolawulo. Ulwalamano lomba womfanekiso alusayi kugcinwa.
Ukuba yinyaniso, umfanekiso uya kulinganiswa (kugcinwe ulwalamano lomba womfanekiso) kubude bendawo yolawulo (ukuba usuka ekhohlo uya ekunene).
Ixela ifayili emayisetyenziswe ukwenzela kumfanekiso ongasemva. Ukuba umfanekiso uqulethe umjelo we-alpha uya kuqukaniselwa kumafanekiso ongasemva wolwazi oluseskrinini.

Ixela ukungabonisi ngaphaya kolungiso lombala ongasemva. Ukuba umbala awubonisi ngaphaya kwawo ngokupheleleyo (ixabiso elinganeno kwe65535), umbala uya kuqukaniselwa kumfanekiso ongasemva wolwazi oluseskrinini.
Ixela umbala ongasemva ukwenzela ulungiso lwendawo yolawulo kwi#RGB.

Sesiphi isimbo esingasemva ekufuneka sisetyenzisiwe kule ndawo yolawulo. Amaxabiso anokubakho ngala "gtk" - iGTK+ elulungiso olulodwa nokungasemva kwe-widget kuya kusetyenziswa, "color" - iqhosha lombala liya kusetyeniswa njengombala ongasemva okanye "image" - umfanekiso oxelwe liqhosha lomfanekiso uya kusetyenziswa njengokusemva.
Iflegi ye-boolean yokubonisa ukuba ingaba umiselo lwexesha langaphambili lomsebenzisi /apps/panel/profiles/default olulodwa ikotshelwe kwindawo entsha apha /apps/panel yolawulo.

Uludwe lwee-ID zolutho lwendawo yolawulo. I-ID nganye ichonga ulutho lwendawo nganye yolawulo (umzk. umndululi, iqhosha lenyathelo okanye iqhosha lemenyu/i-bar). Imimiselo yezi zinto nganye igcinwa apha /apps/panel/objects/$(id).

local_schema.short_desc: Uludwe lwe-ID yenkqutyana ye-applet yendawo yolawulo
local_schema.longdesc: Uludwe lwee-ID zenkqutyana ye-applet yendawo yolawulo. I-ID nganye ichonga inkqutyana ye-applet yendawo yolawulo nganye-nganye. Imimiselo yezi nkqutyana zee-applet nganye zigcinwa apha /apps/panel/applets/$(id).
Uludwe lwee-ID zendawo yolawulo. i-ID nganye ichonga indawo yolawulo yomgangatho ophezulu nganye-nganye. Imimiselo yezi ndawo zolawulo nganye zigcinwa apha /apps/panel/toplevels/$(id).

local_schema.short_desc: Yandisa uludwe lwenkqubo apha"Phumeza Inkqubo" ingxoxo
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyaniso, ukudwelisa "Iinkqubo Ezaziwayo" "Kwimpumezo Yeenkqubo" ingxoxo iyandiswa xa ivulwa ingxoxo. Eli qhosha libaluleke kuphela xa ulwazi lwe enable_program_list luyinyaniso.

local_schema.short_desc: Inika isakhono kuludwe lwenkqubo apha"Phumeza Inkqubo Yekhompyutha" ingxoxo
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyaniso, ukudwelisa "Iinkqubo Ezaziwayo" "Kwimpumezo Yenkqubo" ingxoxo yenziwa ukuba ibe khona. Nokuba ukudwelisa kwandisiwe okanye akunjalo xa ingxoxo eboniswayo ilawulwa liqhosha le show_program_list.
Ukuba yinyaniso, indawo yolawulo ayisayi kuvumela umsebenzisi ukunyanzelisa inkqubo ukuba iphume ngokususa ufikelelo kwiqhosha lokunyanzelisa ukuphuma.
Ukuba yinyaniso, indawo yolawulo ayisayi kuvumela umsebenzisi ukuba aphume, ngokumshenxisela kwizingeniso emenyu yokuphuma.

Uludwe lwee-IID zenkqutyana ye-applet ezingazi kuhoywa yindawo yolawulo. Ngale ndlela ungasaphula isakhono see-applet ezithile sokulayisha okanye sokuzibonakalisa kwimenyu. Umzekelo ukuze kwaphulwe isakhono umyaleli omncinci wenkqutyana ye-applet ufakela oku 'OAFIID:GNOME_MiniCommanderApplet' kolu ludwe. Indawo yolawulo mayiphinde iqaliselwe oku ukuze isebenze.

Ukuba yinyaniso, indawo yokulawula ayisayi kuvumela naziphi iinguquko zomiselo lwendawo yokulawula. Ii-applet ngobunye bazo zisenokufuna ukutshixelwa ngokwahlukana. Indawo yolawulo mayiphinde iqaliswe ukuze oku kwenzeke.
Ukuba yinyaniso, isindululi siyagxininiswa xa umsebenzisi eshenxisela isikhanyisi phezu kwaso.
Ukuba yinyaniso, ingxoxo iboniswa icela uqinisekiso lokuba ingaba umsebenzisi ufuna ukuyisusa na indawo yolawulo.
Ukuba yinyani, idrowa iyakuzivalekela ngokwayo xa umsebenzisi ecofa isindululi kuyo.
Ukuba yinyaniso, amacebiso ngezixhobo aboniswa njengezinto ezikwindawo yolawulo.
Isimbo senyathelo elimelwe leli qhosha. Amaxabiso anokubakho ngala "lock", "logout", "run", "search" no "screenshot". Eli qhosha liyimfuneko kuphela xa iqhosha object_type likoku "action-applet".
Indawo yefayili ye .desktop echaza isindululi. Eli qhosha liyimfuneko kuphela ukuba isitshixo object_type sithi "launcher-object".
Indlela ekwakhiwa kuyo iziqulatho zemenyu. Iqhosha liyimfuneko kuphela xa iqhosha use_menu_path liyinyaniso kwaye neqhosha object_type likoku "menu-object".

local_schema.short_desc: Sebenzisa indlela elungiselelweyo ukwenzela iziqulatho zemenyu
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyaniso, iqhosha le menu_path lisetyenziswa njengendlela apho iziqulatho zemenyu zinokwakhiwa khona. Ukuba asiyonyaniso, iqhosha le menu_path alihoywa. Eli qhosha lifuneka kuphela ukuba iqhosha le object_type lithi "menu-object".

Indawo yefayili yomfanekiso esetyenziswa njengomfanekiso womqondiso ukwenzela iqhosha lento. Eli qhosha liyimfuneko kuphela xa iqhosha le object_type lisithi "drawer-object" okanye "menu-object" naxa ukusetyenziswa kweqhosha ye use_custom_icon kuyinyaniso.

local_schema.short_desc: Sebenzisa umfanekiso ongumqondiso ukwenzela iqhosha lento
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyani, iqhosha le custom_icon lisetyenziswa njengomfanekiso ongumqondiso. Ukuba ayiyonyani, iqhosha le custom_icon alihoywa. Eli qhosha liyimfuneko kuphela xa iqhosha le object_type linje "menu-object" okanye "drawer-object".

local_schema.short_desc: Icebiso ngesixhobo liboniselwa idrowa okanye imenyu
local_schema.longdesc: Isiqendu sokubonisa kumacebiso ngesixhobo ukwenzela le drowa okanye le menyu. Eli qhosha liyimfuneko kuphela xa iqhosha object_type lisithi "drawer-object" okanye "menu-object".
Umchongi wendawo yolawulo oqhotyoshelwe kule drowa. Eli qhosha liyimfuneko kuphela xa iqhosha object_type lisithi "drawer-object".
Ukuba yinyaniso, umsebenzisi makangayisusi i-applet ngaphandle kokuqala avule ngesitshixo into esebenzisa okukhethwa kwimenyu okukoku "Vula ngesitshixo".

local_schema.short_desc: Tolika indawo ngokokuba kufutshane kwayo kumngcipheko osezantsi/osekunene
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyaniso, indawo yento itolikwa ngokokuba kufutshane kwayo kumngcipheko wasekunene (okanye ezantsi ukuba isuka phezulu iya ezantsi) wendawo yolawulo.
Indawo yento yale ndawo yolawulo. Indawo ixelwa ngokwenani lee-pixels ukusuka ekhohlo (okanye phezulu xa imi ngobude) komngcipheko wendawo yolawulo.

local_schema.short_desc: Indawo yolawulo yomgangatho ophezulu equlethe into
local_schema.longdesc: Umchongi wendawo yolawulo yomgangatho ophezulu oqulethe le nto.

local_schema.short_desc: Izakhelo zemikrozo esuka ekhohlo kumvuli-mvali wezithuba zokusebenza

local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyaniso, umvuli-mvali wezithuba uya kubonisa zonke izithuba zokusebenza. Ngaphandle koko, iya kubonisa kuphela isithuba sokusebenza sangoku.
Ukusetyenziswa kweqhosha kwaliwe kwiGNOME 2.6 kuthandwa iqhosha 'lokulungisa'. Imizobo igciniwe ukwenzela ukuhambelana neenguqulelo ezindala ngaphezulu.
Ukusetyenziswa kweqhosha kwaliwe kwiGNOME 2.6 kuthandwa iqhosha 'lokulungisa'. Imizobo igciniwe ukwenzela ukuhambelana neenguqulelo ezindala ngaphezulu.
Ukusetyenziswa kweqhosha kwaliwe kwiGNOME 2.6 kuthandwa iqhosha 'lokulungisa'. Imizobo igciniwe ukwenzela ukuhambelana neenguqulelo ezindala ngaphezulu.
Ukuba yinyaniso, bonisa amanani eeveki kwikhalenda.
Ukuba yinyaniso, bonisa umhla kuludwe lweziqendu eziboniswayo xa isalathi siphezu kwewotshi.
Ukuba yinyaniso, bonisa umhla ewotshini, ukongeza exesheni.
Ukuba yinyaniso, bonisa imizuzwana exesheni.
I-url ozenzele yona apho unokufumana kwakhona imaphu ye-radar.

local_schema.short_desc: Sebenzisa i-url ozenzele yona kwimaphu ye-radar
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyani, fumana kwakhona ke imaphu ye-radar kwindawo ebalulwe liqhosha le "radar".
Thatha imaphu ye-radar kuhlaziyo ngalunye.
Iyunithi yokusetyenziselwa iqondo lobushushu.
Iyunithi yokusetyenziselwa isantya somoya.
Iyunithi yokusetyenziselwa uxinzelelo.
Iyunithi yokusetyenziselwa ukubonakala.
Sebenzisa iiyunithi ze-metric endaweni yeeyuni zesingesi.
Ikhefu, ngemizuzwana, phakathi kohlaziyo oluzenzekelayo.
Imisela ukuba mhlawumbi inkqutyana yekhompyutha izihlaziya ngokuzenzekelayo izitatistiki zayo zemozulu okanye ayizenzi njalo.
Eli gama lingamiselwa ukuba ufuna igama elilungiselweyo lomfanekiso ongumqondiso womgqomo phezu kwe-desktop.
Eli gama lingamiselwa ukuba ufuna igama elilumgiselweyo lomfanekiso ongumqondiso wasekhaya phezu kwe-desktop.
Eli gama lingamiselwa ukuba ufuna igama elilungiselweyo lomfanekiso ongumqondiso wekhompyutha phezu kwe-desktop.
Ukuba le nto imiselwe kwinyani, imifanekiso engumqondiso enxulumanisa kwimithamo enyusiweyo iya kubekwa phezu kwe-deskop.
Ukuba le nto imiselwe kwinyani, umfanekiso ongumqondiso onxulumanisa umgqomo uya kubekwa phezu kwe-desktop.
Ukuba le nto imiselwe inyani, umfanekiso ongumqondiso onxulumanisa indawo yekhompyutha uyakubekwa kwi-desktop.
Ukuba lento imiselwe kwinyani, umfanekiso ongumqondiso onxulumanisa isiqulathi-zifayili sasekhaya iya kubekwa phezu kwe-desktop.
Ukuba imiselwe kwinyani, i-Nautilus iya kubonisa kuuphela iziqulathi-zifayili ezikwicala lomthi kwifestile yeglasi. Ngenye indlela iya kubonisa iziqulathi-zifayili kunye neefayili ngokunjalo.
Ulandlelwano lomqulu omiselweyo kokubonakala kuluhlu.

local_schema.short_desc: Misela uluhlu lwemiqulu ebonakalayo kuluhlu lokubonakalayo
local_schema.longdesc: Uluhlu olumiselweyo lwemiqulu ebonakalayo kuluhlu lokubonakalayo.
Misela umgangatho woluhlu lokwandiza.

Ukuba yinyani, iifayili kwiifestile ezintsha ziya kukhethwa ngohlobo olugqwethiweyo. Oko kukuthi ukuba likhetlewe ngegama, endaweni yokukhetha iifayili ukusuketa ku "a" ukuya ku "z", ziya kukhetlwa ukusuka ku "z" ukuya ku "a".
Ulandelelwano lokhetho olumiselweyo lwezinto ezikuluhlu lokubonakalayo. Amaxabiso angenzekayo ngala "name", "size", "type", kwakunye ne "modification_date".
Umgangatho wokwandisa omiselweyo osetyenziswa kokubonakalayo komfanekiso ongumqondiso.
Ukuba yinyani, iifestile ezintsha ziya kusebenzisa uyilo lwezandla ngommiselo.
Ukuya yinyani, iilebhile ziya kubekwa ecaleni kwemifanekiso eyimiqondiso endaweni yaphantsi kwayo.
Ukuba yinyani, imifanekiso yomqondiso iya kulungiswa ngokuqina-qina ngommiselo ezifestileni ezintsha.

Ukuba yinyani, iifayili kwiifestile ezintsha ziya kukhethwa ngohlobo olugqwethiweyo. Oko kukuthi, ukuba zikhethwe ngegama, endaweni yokukhetha iifayili ukusukela ku "a" ukuya ku "z", ziya kukhethwa ukusukela ku "z" ukuya ku "a"; ukuba zikhethwe ngobungakanani, endaweni yokuba zikhethwe ngokunyuswa ziya kukhethwa ngokuncipha.
Ulandelelwano lokhetho olumiselweyo kwizinto ezikumfanekiso ongumqondiso obonakalayo. Amaxabiso angenzekayo ngala "name", "size", "type", "modification_date", kunye ne "emblems".

local_schema.short_desc: Uluhlu lweenkcazelo zemifanekiso ezinokwenzeka kwimifanekiso engumqondiso
local_schema.longdesc: Uluhlu lweenkcazelo zomfanekiso ngezantsi komfanekiso ongumqondiso ngaphakathi komboniso womfanekiso ongumqondiso kunye nekhompyutha ephathekayo. Elona nani leenkcazelo zomfanekiso ezibonisiweyo lixhomekeke kumgangato wokwandisa. Amaxabiso amkelekileyo ngala: "size", "type", "date_modified", "date_changed", "date_accessed", "owner", "group", "permissions", "octal_permissions" and "mime_type".
Okubonakalayo kwiglasi yefestile esecaleni kubonise kwiifestile ezivulwe ngokutsha.

local_schema.short_desc: Bonisa iglasi yefestile esecaleni kwiifestile ezintsha
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba imiselwe kwinyani, iifestile ezisandul' ukuvulwa ziya kubonakalisa iglasi yefestile esecaleni.

local_schema.short_desc: Bonisa umgca wokubonisa okwenzekayo kwinkqubo kwiifestile ezintsha
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba imiselwe inyani, iifestile ezisandul'ukuvulwa ziya kubonakalisa umgca wokubonakalisa okuqhubekayo kwinkqubo.

local_schema.short_desc: Bonisa umgca wokubonisa indawo kwiifestile ezintsha
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba imiselwe kwinyani, iifestile ezisandul' ukuvulwa ziya kubonakalisa umgca wokubonakalisa wendawo.

local_schema.short_desc: Bonisa umgca wokubonisa okuqhubekayo wezixhobo kwiifestle ezintsha
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba imiselwe kwinyani, iifestile ezisandul' ukuvulwa ziyakibonakalisa umgca wokubonakalisa izixhobo.
Ubude obumiselweyo becala leglasi yefestile kwiifestile ezintsha.
Ukulungiselela kwemihla yeefayili. Amaxabiso amkelekileyo yi "locale", "iso", kunye ne "informal".

local_schema.short_desc: Igama leFayili Lokungasemva Kwifestile Yeglasi Esecaleni Elimiselweyo
local_schema.longdesc: Igama lefayili lokuniselweyo okungasemva okusecaleni. Isetyenziswa kuphela ukuba i-side_pane_background_set iyinyani.

local_schema.short_desc: Misela ngokufanelekileyo Umbala Wokungasemva Kweglasi yefestile esecaleni
local_schema.longdesc: Igama lefayili lokuniselweyo okungasemva okusecaleni. Isetyenziswa kuphela ukuba i-side_pane_background_set iyinyani.

local_schema.short_desc: Okumiselweyo Okuyifestile Yeglasi Esecaleni Yokungasemva Okulungiselweyo
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba okungummiselo okulungiselweyo kokungasemva kwiglasi yefestile esecaleni kumiselwe.
Igama lefayili lokumiselweyo okungasemya kwesiqulathi-zifayili. Isetyenziswa kuphela ukuba i-background_set iyinyani.
Ukuba okungasemva kwisiqulathi-zifayili sommiselo owenzelweyo kumiselwe.

local_schema.short_desc: Imida yokukhangela xa usebenzisa isitena sokukhangela
local_schema.longdesc: Imida xa ulinganisa iifayili ezikhangelweyo kwisitena sokukhangela. Ukuba imiselwe ku"search_by_text", emva koko u- Nautilus iyaku Khangela iifayili ngegama lefayili kuphela . Ukuba imiselwe ku "search_by_text_and_properties", emva koko i-Nautilus iya ku khangela iifayili ngegama lefayili kwakunye neempawu zefayili.

local_schema.short_desc: I-Nautilus isebenzisa isiqulathi-zifayili sasekhaya sabasebenzisi njenge-desktop
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba imiselwe kwinyani, emva koko i-Nautilus iyakusebenzisa isiqulathi-zifayili sasekhaya somsebenzisi njenge-desktop. Ukuba ayiyiyo, iyakusebenzisa. i~/Desktop njenge-desktop.
Inkcazelo yefonti esetyenziselwa imifanekiso eyimiqondiso phezu kwe-desktop.
Ukuba imiselwe kwinyani, emva koko i-Nautilus iya kuzoba imifanekiso yomqondiso phezu kwe-desktop.
Ukuba imiselwe kwinyani, emva koko i-Nautilus ibonisa iziqulathi-zifayili ngaphambi kokubonisa iifayile ezisemfanekisweni womqondiso nakokubonakalayo kuluhlu.

local_schema.short_desc: Ukuba ukhangele ngaphambili izandi xa ukhangela nge-mouse phezu komfanekiso womqondiso

local_schema.longdesc: Iziqulathi-zifayili ngaphaya kweli cala iyakunqunyulwa ibe malunga nobubungakanani. Injongo yoku kukuphepha ngokungekho njongweni ukudubula isikhewu imfumba nokubulala i-Nautilus kwiziqulathi-zifayili ezinzima. Ixabiso elilandulayo libonakalisa ukungakikho komba. Umba uthelekelelwa ngenxa yokufundwa kweziqulathi-zifayili ngesixukuvana.

local_schema.short_desc: Obona bukhulu bobungakanani bomfanekiso obenzelwe ukutyhila ngokukhawuleza
local_schema.longdesc: Imifanekiso kobu bungakanani (ngee-bytes) azinakutyhilwa ngokukhawulezisa. Injongo yesi sakhelo kukuphepha ukutyhila ngokukhawuleza imifanekiso emikhulu enokuthabatha ithuba elide ukulayisha okanye isebenzise iinkumbulo ezininzi.

local_schema.short_desc: Ubonisa nini ukutyhila ngokukhawuleza iifayili zomfanekiso

local_schema.longdesc: Igama lomxholo we-Nautilus lokusetyenziswa. Liye laliwa njengo-Nautilus 2.2. Nceda usebenzise umxholo womfanekiso ongumqondiso endaweni yoku.

local_schema.short_desc: Omakwenziwe ngeefayili zombhalo ophumezekayo xa zenziwe ukuba zisebenze
local_schema.longdesc: Omakwenziwe ngeefayili zombhalo eziphumezekayo xa zenziwe ukuba zisebenze (zicofwe kanye okanye ngokuphindwe kabini). Amaxabiso anokwenzeka ngala "launch" ukuzindulula njengeenkqubo, "ask" ukubuza oma ukwenze ngendlela elula eya kunxibelelwano, kwakunye no"display" ukuzibonisa njengeefayili zemibhalo.

local_schema.short_desc: Uhlobo locofa olusetyenziswayo xa kundululwa/kuvulwa iifayili
local_schema.longdesc: Amaxabiso anokwenzeka ngla "single" ukindulula iifayili nqokucofa okukodwa okanye "double" ukuzindulula ngokucofa ngokuphindwe kabini.

local_schema.short_desc: Ubonisa nini umbhalo oboniswa ngaphambi kwexesha kwimifanekiso eyimiqondiso

local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba imiselwe kwinyami, i-Nautilus iya kuba nesimo esikuvumela ukuba ucime ifayili ngoko nangoko isendaweni eyiyo, endaweni yokuyisa emgqomeni. Esi simo singayingozi, ngoko ke lumka.

local_schema.short_desc: Inceda isimilo se-Nautilus sodidi apho zonke iifestile izizikhangeli
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba imiselwe kwinyani, emva koko zonke iifestile ze-Nautilus ziya kuba ziifestile zesikhangeli. le yindlela i-Nautilus yayiqhele ukusebenza ngaphambi kwengxelo i-2.6, yaye abanye abantu bakhetha le ndlela yokwenza.

local_schema.short_desc: Isinqumli se-keyboard sokwenza ifonti ukuba ibe yisayizi yesiqhelo
local_schema.longdesc: Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokwenza isayizi yefonti ibe yeqhelekileyo. Libonakiliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo kunesetyenziswe kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokwenza ifonti ukuba ibe ncinane. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo nesetyenziswa kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyikubakho sinqumli kwesi senzo.

local_schema.longdesc: Iqhosha elimnqumlayo le-keyboard lokwenza ifonti ukuba ibe inkulu. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo nesetyenziswe kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli kwesi senzo.

Ukuba ngaba aumisela oku ekunokukhetwha kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

Ukuba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

local_schema.short_desc: Isinqumli se-keyboad sokuvula kwakho ungakhuphanga kumbane kunye nokucima i-terminal
local_schema.longdesc: Iqhosha lesinqumli se-keyboard sokuvula kwakhona ungakhuphanga kumbane kunye nokucima i-terminal. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo kunesetyenziswa kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

local_schema.short_desc: Isinqumli se-keyboard sokuyivula kwakhona ungayikhuphanga kumbane i-terminal
local_schema.longdesc: Iqhosha lesinqumli se-keyboard sokuvula kwakhona ungakhuphanga kumbane kwi-terminal. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo nesetyenziswa kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama akhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akukho sinqumli kwesi senzo.

Iqhosha lesinqumli le-keyboard lokumisela isihloko se-terminal. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama mgemdlela efanayo nesityenziswa kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akukho sinqumli kwesi senzo.

local_schema.short_desc: Isinqumli se-keyboard sokwenza i-toggle yokubonakala kwe-menubar
local_schema.longdesc: Iqhosha lesinqumli se-keyboard sokwenza i-toggle yokubonakala kwe-menubar. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama kulungiselelo olufanayo lwe-GTK+ iifayili zovimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku kunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

local_schema.short_desc: Isinqumli se-keyboard sokwenza i-toggle yenkqubo yesikrini esigcweleyo
local_schema.longdesc: Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokuveza inkqubo egcweleyo yesikrini. Libonakaliswe ngendlela efanayo nesetyenziswe kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovimba. Ukuba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama akhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokuncamathisela okuqulethweyo kwe-clipboard kwi-terminal. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo kunesetyenziswe kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokukopa umbhalo okhethiweyo uye kwi-clipboard. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo ensetyenziswe kwi-GTK+ iifayili zovimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sishunquli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokuvala i-window. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo nesetyenziswe kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokuvala i-tab. Elibonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo nesetyenziswe kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovima. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko le ndlela kuluhlu lwagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokuzisa unxibelelwano lokudalwa kwenkangeleko. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo nesetyenziselwe i-GTK+iifayili zikavimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuye kluluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard yesi senzo.

Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokuvula i-window entsha. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo nesetyenziswe kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovimba. Ukuba ngab umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

Iqhosha elinqumlayo le-keyboard lokuvula i-tab entsha. Libonakaliswe njengoluhlu lwamagama ngendlela efanayo nesetyenziswe kwi-GTK+ iifayili zoovimba. Ukuba ngaba umisela oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuluhlu lwamagama olukhethekileyo "disabled", ngoko ke akuyi kubakho sinqumli se-keyboard kwesi senzo.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ukuyisebenzisa inkqubo okanye ukungayisebenzisi
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyani, i-terminal iyakusebenzisa ifonti esemgangathweni ye-desktop-global ukuba ngaba inesithuba esinye (kunye nefonti efana kakhulu enokuza nayo ngenye indlela).

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ukusebenzisa imibala esuka kumxholo we-terminal yesixhobo
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyani, i-scheme somxholo wombala osetyenziswe kwiibhokisi zongeniso lombhalo ziya kusetyenziselwa i-terminal, endaweni yemibala enikwa ngumsebenzisi.

Misela ukuba yeyiphi ikhowudi iqhosha le-delete eliyenzayo. Amaxabiso anokwenzeka ngala-"ascii-del" kuphawu lwe-ASCII DEL, "control-h ku-Control-H (AKA uphawu lwe-ASCII BS), "escape sequence" kulandelelwano lokuphepha olubotshelelwe ku-backspace okanye u-delete. "escape sequence" ngokuqhelekileyo utahthwa njengomiselo oluqhelekileyo lweqhosha lika-Delete.

Misela ukuba yeyiphi ikhowudi iqhosha le-backspace eliyenzayo. Amaxabiso anokwenzeka ngala-"ascii-del" ngophawu lwe-ASCII DEL, "control-h" ku-Control-H (AKA uphawu lwe-ASCII BS), "escape-sequence" kulandelelwano lokuphepha olubotshelelwe ku-backspace okanye u-delete. "ascii-del" ngokuqhelekileyo uthathwa njengomiselo oluchanekileyo lweqhosha le-Backspace.

local_schema.short_desc: Uwenza ube mnyama kanjani umfanekiso wokungasemva
local_schema.longdesc: Ixabiso eliphakathi kuka-0.0 kunye no-1.0 elikhombisa ukuba umfanekiso wokungasemva wenziwe mnyama kangakanani. U-0.0 uthetha ukuba akukho bumnyama. U-1.0 uthetha ukuba kumnyama ngokuphelelyo. Kuphunyezo lwangoku, kukho imigangatho emibini kuphela enokwenzeka, ngoko ke ummiselo uziphethe njenge-boolean, apho u-0.0 enza ukuba kungasebenzi okwenza mnyama.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ukuhlisa unyusa umfanekiso wokungasemva
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyani, hlisa unyusa umfanekiso wokungasemva ngombhalo wokungangambili; ukuba ayiyonyani, gcina umfanekiso ukwisikhundla esimileyo uze uhlise unyusa umbhalo ongaphezu kwawo.
Igama lefayili lomfanekiso wokungasemva.
Igama lefoni i-Pango. Imizekelo yile-"Sans 12" okanye "Monospace Bold 14".

i-Terminals zinemibala yengqokelo yezixhobo ezili-16 Iinkqubo zekhompyutha ezingaphakathi kwe-terminal ezingazisebenzisa. Le yileya ngqokelela yezixhobo, engohlobo loluhlu olwahlulwe yikholoni lwamagama emibala. Amagama emibala kufuneka ukuba abe ngoholo lwe-hex "#FF00FF"
Umfaneksio ongumqondiso wokusetyanziswa kwii-taba/windows uqulethe le nkangeleko.

local_schema.short_desc: Umyalezo ozenzele wona ukuba uwusebenzise endaweni yetoliki yemiyalelo
local_schema.longdesc: Qhuba lo myalelo endaweni yetoliki yemiyalelo, ukuba use_custom_command uyinyani.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ukuqhuba umyalelo ozenzele wona endaweni yetoliki yemiyalelo
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyani, umiselo lwexabiso lomyalelo_ozenzele wona uya kusetyenziswa endaweni yokuqhuba itoliki yemiyalelo.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ukuhlaziya iirekhodi zokungena xa undulula umyalelo we-terminal
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyani, iirekhodi zenkqubo yokungena i-utmp kunye ne-wtmp ziya kuhlaziywa xa umyalelo ongaphakathi kwe-terminal undululwa.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ukundulula umyalelo kwi-terminal njengetoliki yemiyalelo yongeno
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyani, umyalelo ongaphakathi kwe-terminal uyakundululwa njengetoliki yemiyalelo yokungena. (argv[0] uya kuba nekhonkco phakathi kwamagama.)

local_schema.short_desc: Into omawuyenze nge-terminal xa umyalelo ongumntwana ukhona
local_schema.longdesc: Amaxabiso anokuba khona a-"close" ukuvala i-terminal, kunye no-"restart" wuvule kwakhona umyalelo.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ukuhlisa unyusa uye ezantsi xa kukho iziphumo ezitsha
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyani, nanini na xa kukho iziphumo ezitsha i-terminal iya kuhla inyuka iye ezantsi.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ukuhlisa unyusa uye ezantsi xa iqhosha licinezelwe
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba yinyani, ukucinezela iqhosha kutsiba i-scrollbar kuye ezantsi.

Xa ukhetha umbhalo nge-word, ukulandelelana kwezi mpawu zithathwa njengamagama angawodwa. Uluhlu lunganikwa njengo-"A-Z". i-Literal hyphen (engabonisi uluhlu) kufuneka ibe luphawu lokuqala olunikiweyo.
Ukuba yinyani, ungenzi ngxolo xa inkqubo yekhompyutha ithulela ukulandelelana kokuphepha kwintsimbi ye-terminal.
Ukuba yinyani, vumela inkqubo yekhompyutha kwi-terminal ukwenza ukuba umbhalo ubonakale ungqindilili.

local_schema.short_desc: Into omawuyenze ngesihloko esenzeka ngaxesha nye
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba ngaba inkqubo yekhompyutha ekwi-terminal imisela isihloko (abantu abaninzi abanjalo banetoliki yemiyalelo emiselwe ukuba yenze oku), umiselo lwesihloko esinokutshintsha sinokucima isihloko sokumiselwa kwenkqubo yekhompyutha, hamba phambi kwaso, hamba emva kwaso, okanye beka esinye endaweni yaso. Amaxabiso anokwenzeka ngala "replace", "before", "after", kunye no-"ignore".
Misela umbala wokungasemva kwe-terminal, njengobalulo lombala (inokuba luhlobo lwe-HTML-isimbo se-hex digits, okanye igama lombala elifana no-"red").
Umbala omiselweyo wombhalo kwi-terminal, ubalulo lombala (lunokuba yi-HTML-isimbo se-hex digits, okanye igama lombala elifana no "red").
Yinayni ukuba ngaba i-menubar kufuneka iboniswe kwi-windows entsha, kwi-windows/ii-tabs kule nkangeleko.
Igama elinokufundwa ngumntu lenkangeleko.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba ukucela uqinisekiso xa uvala i-terminal yefestile
local_schema.longdesc: Nokuba ngaba ukucela uqinisekiso xa uvala i-terminal yefestile enangaphezulu kwe-tab enye evuliweyo.

local_schema.short_desc: Nokuba ngaba isinqumli esisemgangathweni se-GTK sofikelelo kwi-menubar senziwe ukuba singasebenzi
local_schema.longdesc: Ngokuqhelekileyo ungafikelela kwi-menubar ngo-F10. Oku usenokuzenzela ngokugqitha ku-gtkrc (gtk-menu-bar-accel = "nayiphina"). Oku ekunokukhethwa kuko kuvumela isinqumlisi esisemgangathweni se-menubar ukuba singasebenzi.
Nokuba ngaba ukuba neqhosha lofikelelo lwe-Alt+unobumba we-menubar. Zinokuphazamisa ezinye iinkqubo zekhompyutha eziqhutywa ngaphakathi kwe-terminal ngoko ke kunokwenzeka ukuba zicinywe.
Inkangeleko emayisetyenziswe xa kuvulwa i-window entsha okanye i-tab. Mayibe profile_list.
Uluhlu lweenkangeleko ezaziwayo kwi-gnome-terminal. Uluhlu luqulethe uluhlu lwamagama olubiza oovinjana beefayili ezinxulumene ne-/apps/gnome-terminal/profiles.
Xa yenzwe yangasebenzi, i-gnome-session iya kuthundeza umsebenzisi phambi kokuphelisa iseshoni.
Inqanaba lesandi njengepesenti yesandi.
Ifonti yombhalo onobubanzi obusisigxina.
Ifonti yombhalo enobubanzi obuguqukayo.
Sebenzisa iifonti ezimiselwe lenkqubo.
Sebenzisa i-caret ye-keyboard elawulekayo xa ujonga amaxwebhu.

local_schema.short_desc: Hambisa ifestile indawo yokusebenzela ibenye ukwehla
Hambisa ifestile indawo yokusebenzela benye ukuya phezulu
Hambisa ifestile indawo yokusebenzela benye ukuya ekunene
Hambisa ifestile indawo yokusebenzela ibenye ukuya ekhohlo

local_schema.longdesc: Iqhosha /apps/metacity/global_keybindings/run_command_window_screenshot lichaza isidibanisi-qhosha esibangela umyalelo obalulwe lolu miselo ukuba ubizwe.
Iqhosha /apps/metacity/global_keybindings/run_command_screenshot lichaza isidibanisi-qhosha esibangela umyalelo obalulwe lolu miselo ukuba ubizwe.
Amaqhosha /apps/metacity/global_keybindings/run_command_N achaza izidibanisi-qhosha ezihambelana nale miyalelo. Ukucofa isidibanisi-qhosha kwi-run_command_N kuya kuvula i-command_N.

local_schema.short_desc: Hambela ngasemva phakathi kweendawo zolawulo nedesktop ngokukhawuleza
Hambela phakathi kweendawo zolawulo nedesktop ngokukhawuleza

local_schema.longdesc: Igama lendawo yokusebenzela.

local_schema.short_desc: Yenza zingasebenzi iimpawu ezingalunganga ezifuneka kwiinkqubo ezindala okanye ezophukileyo
(Awuzalisekiswanga) Ukwehla usenyuka kusebenza ngokweenkqubo ingezizo iifestile
Ukuba kuyinene, rhwebisa ngosetyenziso kusetyenziso loovimba olungaphantsi

local_schema.longdesc: Ixelela iMetacity indlela yokuzalisekisa umboniso ovakalayo enokuthi intsimbi yenkqubo okanye enye inkqubo isalathisi se-'bell' esikhaliswe ngayo. Ngokwangoku kukho amaxabiso amabini asebenzayo, "fullscreen", nebangela udanyazo olumhlophe-mnyama kwiscreen sisonke kunye "frame_flash" ebangela ititlebar yenkqubo nethumele isignali yentsimbi ukuba idanyaze. Ukuba inkqubo ethumele intsimbi ayaziwa (njengoko kuqhele ukuba njalo kokumiyo "system beep"), ititlebar yefestile ekuqwalaselwe kuyo iyadanyaza.
Imisa ukuba iinkqubo zekhompyutha okanye inkqubo ingadala ii-'beeps' ezivakalayo; zingasetyenziswa ngokusebenzisana 'nentsimbi evakalayo' ukuvumela ii-'beeps' ezithuleyo.

local_schema.short_desc: Sebenzisa ifonti yenkqubo esemgangathweni kwizihloko zefestile
local_schema.longdesc: Ukuba kuyinene, sukuyihoya i-titlebar_font, sebenzisa ifonti yenkqubo esemgangathweni kwizihloko zefestile.
Umxholo umisa imbonakalo yemida yefestile, ititlebar, nokunye.
Ukulibaziseka kwexesha ngaphambi kokunyusa ifestile xa auto_raise isetelwe kwinyani. Ulibaziseko lunikezwa kumawaka esekondi.

Imowdi yefocus yefestile ibonisa indlela iifestile ezivulwa ngayo. Kukho iindlela ezintathu ezinokwenziwa ngayo; "click" uthetha ukuba iifestile kufuneka zicofwe ukuze kuqwalaselwe kuzo, "sloppy" kuthetha iifestile ziqwalaselwe xa imouse ingena kwifestile kunye "mouse" uthetha ukuba iifestile ziqwalaselwe xa imouse ingena kwifestile ize ingaqwalaselwa xa imouse ishiya ifestile.

local_schema.short_desc: Isilungisi sokusetyenziswa kumanyathelo okucofa kwifestile elungisiweyo
